snippet: He is the first to hold the post since Riccardo Muti left six years ago.
lead_paragraph: The Teatro Alla Scala in Milan has appointed Daniel Barenboim as its music director, the first person to hold the title since Riccardo Muti left amid acrimony six years ago. Mr. Barenboim, who is also music director of the Staatsoper in Berlin, will take up the post on Dec. 1, on a five-year contract.

headline.main: La Scala Names Barenboim Music Director
